text: The Kia EV6 is a electric compact Crossover SUV made by Kia since 2021. == History and Features == The Kia EV6 had its photos revealed in March 2021. later it was launched in August. its the first dedicated electric vehicle from Kia and the first car developed on the Electric Global Modular Platform (E-GMP) simillar to the Hyundai Ioniq 5 and the first car to be named under a new nomenclature designated for a line of electric cars from Kia. It has a electric motor with 125-430 kW (168-577 hp depending on the version) a single- speed reduction gear transmission and a range of up to 510 km (317 mi) the car has a high-performance version launched in 2022 called EV6 GT that probably go to zero to 100 km/h (62 mph) in 3.5 seconds. the EV6 was later improved in 2024. some of the improvements include a new battery pack. == Markets == The Kia EV6 is currently sold in Europe. North America. South Korea Australia. New Zealand. Southeast Asian countries. India and Mexico the car won several rewards which include the 2022 European Car of the Year. == References == EV6 Category:2020s automobiles Category:Sport utility vehicles
title: Kia EV6
